title: I like the game but can‚Äôt play it anymore
text:
I‚Äôve been a player since October or November in 2020. I was constantly playing with my friends and I had a lot of fun with it. It was always highly enjoyable to stab my friends in electrical, or nervously run around doing tasks while you suspect everyone. And even when I stopped playing as often, I would still revisit it quite a bit for two more months before I had to focus on school.

Well, now that it‚Äôs summer, I wanted to play again. Especially after the updates with the new map and new colors. And I tried to play. But the chat feature doesn‚Äôt work at all. Every time I tap it, nothing comes up. I can‚Äôt talk to the other players at all, and I end up getting voted out as a result. It‚Äôs not fun that way at all. I want to talk and tell them what I see. I‚Äôm not malicious towards other players unless they say something rude first. But my chat doesn‚Äôt work in any of the maps. I can‚Äôt play it anymore because of this chat issue, and I don‚Äôt have it downloaded anywhere else. 

I tried to join the discord server to fix it. I waited for ten minutes and agreed to the rules but it didn‚Äôt work, so I‚Äôm not sure what to do. I really like this game and want to keep playing it, but can‚Äôt if I can‚Äôt talk to the other players.

title: GAME FOR GODS OF MYSTERY (or a big fat toxic community)
text: This is legit one of my fave games. I am not rating it based on gameplay, because that would mean that it would be five stars. My  2 star review is because of the community. Now, the reason it‚Äôs not 1 Star is because I met some really good people. Like IJevI, they were kind, friendly, and nice. They wouldn‚Äôt even kill me if he was the impostor. He would legit kill everyone else and leave me be. So I did the same. But on the other hand, ITS RADIOACTIVE ‚ò¢Ô∏è X TOXIC X 1,000,000. I‚Äôve seen people being racist, trolls, hackers, cheaters, discord tryhards (people who cheat by letting their friend get killed and their friend tells them who it is), and more. That is absolutely unacceptable. I am not giving up among us, just warning y‚Äôall of the murky waters ahead if you get this. Add friend system!!! I want friend system!!! Don‚Äôt do so in the next update, and I am telling my friends it‚Äôs a bad game, it is sparse in terms of account management (cuz there is no account managements or accounts at all) it has a toxic community, and can have bad connections sometimes. Edit: well, thanks for adding anonymous options! It will help a lot in games. I also appreciate you adding symbols to the wires for those colorblind people. Still, add a friend system. I really want to add my friends. You need to fix this. I meet new and kind people. Develop friendship. They only last a day. üòûüòûüòû

title: Great, but.....
text: Honestly I would give this game like 3/5 stars, but I‚Äôm not, simply because I want my review to be seen. I love this game. I love the concept, the fact that you can play with friends, and of course the cute little characters. However, recently I‚Äôve been having quit a few issues with the game that is causing me to not want to play. First of all, I have probably played around 10-15 games today. I was not an imposter in a single game! To me, that is just not right. I understand that the imposter is probably chosen by random, but there has to be a better system. Let‚Äôs be honest, most people really want to play the imposter, so when every single game you join, your assigned a crew mate it can become extremely frustrating. My second problem with this game is even more frustrating. Whenever I purposely log out of a game I‚Äôm not allowed to join another game for 15 minutes!! That is extremely annoying because I obviously logged out the game for a reason. Like today I logged out because I had to go to a class, and I didn‚Äôt have enough time to finish the game. It‚Äôs like their punishing me for playing their own game. So I don‚Äôt know how much longer this game will stay on my Home Screen, but from experience it probably won‚Äôt be much longer.

title: A little too much?
text:
i don‚Äôt write reviews, especially if i know that i‚Äôm just going to delete it but for this i‚Äôm not, i‚Äôll give you a chance. I really like playing this game to pass some free time or when i‚Äôm bored and i‚Äôve met many amazing people on here. One thing i‚Äôm not really sure on is why we can‚Äôt chat regularly anymore? I understand that you want to have your game more kid friendly but the quick chat system is very confusing and not much could be said. For example, I was playing a game once and it was super funny on how it ended so i wanted to express how i felt about and congratulate the people who won but i couldn‚Äôt, didn‚Äôt find anything that‚Äôd fit what i wanted so i gave up. 

A way to better this is by making it how it was before? I think that was better than right now because it feels like you either make the choice to struggle with finding what you want or just or respond. Yes, i know the will inappropriate, immature, rude people (mainly early teens/tweens) will still be messing up the game in their ways but do you have to bring it down to this? Isn‚Äôt there a way to block out the words that aren‚Äôt so kid friendly? I‚Äôm just giving you my opinion and ideas about the game but overall i don‚Äôt really see a problem with anything else..

title: Good but a few problems‚Ä¶
text: First of all, I think that this is a really good game and it‚Äôs fun to play. I‚Äôve always liked murder mystery types of games so I really enjoyed playing this. However, the new update sorta ruined it for me. You can‚Äôt chat freely unless you log in to your account, give an email address, or if your under the age of 13. And yeah, I understand why they did that; there were lots of people cursing, saying terrible words, cyber bullying, online dating, etc. But it‚Äôs still annoying. You can only say certain things and I can‚Äôt ask ‚Äúwhy‚Äù when someone accuses someone of being imposter. Plus, you can‚Äôt change your name freely either unless your logged in or at least 13. Again, I get why they did that, but I‚Äôd like it if you could just censor inappropriate names or tell that player that the name is inappropriate (same for the chat; you could just censor what the player is saying). To avoid the chat problem, you could just play with friends in a voice call. But some people (like me) don‚Äôt have many friends who play Among Us or video games in general. I would really appreciate it if you could just censor inappropriate stuff instead of not letting players say what they want :]

title: Awesome game, some issues tho
text: Among us is a very addicting game that you can‚Äôt stop playing. Although people always team on among us and it‚Äôs get kinda annoying. If you can make something to give them a warning that would be great! sometimes when I‚Äôm impostor or just a crew mate I get kicked out for no reason. It says ‚Äúkicked out game due to issue‚Äù or ‚Äúyou need to update among us‚Äù but when I go to see if I need to update it it‚Äôs false information. People also flirt on among us or say they will track you down. I know you can‚Äôt do anything about the flirting but can you maybe ban or kick the people that say they will track you down. Don‚Äôt get me wrong I know they can actually track you done but it‚Äôs scary when people say that you. Overall this game is very very fun. I recommend maybe adding a free pack for like a baby. The pack costs 4$ I think. I don‚Äôt wanna waste money on a game I‚Äôm not gonna play forever. Can you make a free pack? Maybe it can just be a baby or even just a stickman! Maybe you can add new colors. You can also add more cams? Not in rooms but maybe add a cam in weapons and cafeteria and communications. You can also add at least 2 more rooms. Maybe a restroom and the task is to put toilets next to eachother. This game is overall one of the funnest game to play with friends and family. Keep it up!

title: Bad update
text: Ok, I really love this game and was looking forward for the new air ship map, but unfortunately with the other stuff that came in the update I couldn‚Äôt even bare to finish a game. In the new update it makes you have to put an age! Which 99.9% of kids just put older ages.  Instead of doing this you should have made players have to put in some information, meaning young kids would have to have there parents sign in for them. And now that in the hypothetical situation only parents and older teens can log in there should be an option to have the quick chat on or off, and if you have it on you will ONLY be able to play with others that have it on so it will be age appropriate, meanwhile teens are teens so yea... also I would like to address the random name situation. I HATE the random name since I was ‚Äúsonic the hedgehog‚Äù and now I‚Äôm Fredrick!!!!!!! (not even my name IRL-) so I think if you during the time you put information you are allowed to put a custom name, therefore adults can make there children‚Äôs name and teens can make there own name. (And if you need to change these settings you have to do the log in process again) These are just my suggestions but I think because of the new update I really dislike among us and I feel like not playing it any more, but if you make these improvements then I will be happy to give it a 5 star!

title: Among Us Is Great, But I have a few suggestions to make the game better!
text: Among us is really fun but sometimes it gets boring, the murderer sometimes refuses to kill so everyone is standing around and it gets boring. Also some people refuse to do tasks. And I was in a game and one of the imposters told EVERYONE who was the imposters and they were even wrong because they weren‚Äôt the imposter but it was really unfair because that person was right. Some ideas would be if you could figure out some way to A. Make it so the imposter cannot say who the other imposters are ( provided if there is more than one ) and I think two other things would be great, the first is make there other game modes, what I mean by this is like where you can do hide n seek, or tag or something like that, people have been getting creative and making the games into that but it would be fun if people could choose modes another thing that would be really really amazing would be if the imposter could get special knifes and you could also rank and you can build maps, I think being able for us to build maps would be sooo cool! These are just suggestions, I just think the game would be even better if we could do some of those things, bye! -Sincerely, An Among Us Player C=

title: Excellent Game, But Has Some Issues
text: This game is incredibly addicting. I always have a good time with my friends or online with strangers. The work done in this game by the four staff members of InnerSloth blows my mind. I'm posting this review prior to the release of the Airship update, which I've heard will release later today. I can only hope they resolve some issues, especially with Polus. The cameras on Polus are extremely glitchy. As you may have seen in other reviews, anything that moves makes a trail of itself across the screen. Another problem with Polus is for mobile players, like myself. When outside, the ground layer glitches out, hiding names and the edges of the map. This helps in no way when I'm playing as the impostor. A frustrating glitch on any map occurs when people leave. It upsets the algorithm, and when the game ends, it just shows a black screen. You then have to restart your game to play again. There is also a glitch with mid-game kicking. It seems one players kick vote may not register to another. This has only occurred a few times for me, but I just wanted to put it out there. Again, I hope that the developers fix this in the next update that drops today. Thank you, InnerSloth, for this wonderful game. And thank you, reader, for reading this extremely long review.

title: Hackers and stupid ping UPDATE: hackers are gone this review was written in January 2021
text:
So.... first time played. Loved it! Got Impostor, got the victory. That was 2019. Listen... in 2020, this game grew. But midway through 2020, hackers like Eris Loris have found their way into the game. And hackers like mod people have been using auto impostor, no kill cooldown, and noclip. I am mad. Now with the quick chat feature? Stupid. (not anymore I fixed my account ignore that) And the names? YOU BANNED THE BLANK NAME. Why? Why? Whyyyyy? Also, the people call emergency meetings (people as in the modders) and say ‚ÄúThis guy is the impostor I saw him vent‚Äù AT THE START OF THE GAME! and, people cheating? OHHH YES THERE IS! People are on discord, and they are on a call. So when a impostor kills one of the people on their call? THEY CALL A EMERGENCY MEETING AND SAY ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs (this color) my friend on discord told me.‚Äù It‚Äôs stupid. Also people are dating. Thats unfair. And another thing is the ping. When I play on a iPhone 13 pro with full 5G, it kicks me out and banned me for 5 min for ‚Äúintentionally disconnecting‚Äù, but I don‚Äôt. Please fix that. Thank you.

UPDATE: I am currently banned for 2 hours for ‚Äúintentionally disconnecting‚Äù when my ping has kicked me out so many times. Hopefully you get this fixed thanks.

title: Some changes
text: I used to play among us everyday whether I would play alone or with friends. Overall it was a fun time and one of my favorite games. After a while of not playing I deleted the app thinking I would never play again due to just loss of interest. But just a couple of days ago a friends requested we play Among Us together and I thought it was a great idea as I used to enjoy the game so much. After reinstalling the app I soon noticed some changes. I‚Äôm not sure if I am just not tech savvy but the game now choses your name and I am unable to change it. Also there is not more freedom to type anything in the game chat. What I liked so much about this game was the ability to make friends, communicate, and create almost a bond with your teammates that would help you win the game. Because of the new update I find it hard to enjoy the game as much as I use to as some aspect of freedom has been taken out of the game. I don‚Äôt understand this update at all and I don‚Äôt know who prefers this version. I feel that it is very difficult now to play and the old version of the game was much better. Now every time I play I feel a negative aspect if because I can no longer create bonds with the people in my party. I hope you take my review into consideration as I feel I am not the only one that feels like this.

title: I don‚Äôt like the update

title: It was fun until...
text:
I found this game through pewdiepie and was super excited to find that it was on mobile so I could try it for myself. The first few weeks were great until....it became popular. The community with in the game itself is very racist, homophobic, and just toxic in general. Also because of how popular it has become their are more hackers. I feel that their should be forbidden words that will prevent you from joining games for one hour if you use them more than 5 times. I try to spread positivity in the chat reassuring people that it‚Äôs just a game no need to get mad. But... when I do I just get called racial slurs, homophobic slurs, and horrible names in general. When joining a game on WiFi it will keep saying unable to connect. And it is too hard to kick people from games especially when everyone has to vote for them to leave. Teaming is a HUGE issue in the game with entire groups of friends outing the imposters as soon as the game starts. The emergency button is used too often... or often use it to SAY HI!!! I find it frustrating when trying to play the game. PLEASE ADD A VOICE CHAT OPTION!!! This would make the game so much easier and I feel that it would defer toxic language because you can hear a person‚Äôs voice. Also, many bugs ranging from, game connection error to animation glitches. PLEASE FIX THIS!!!! 

P.S : Sorry for the long paragraph I just love this game but hate the negativity surrounding the gameplay!

title: Add a party and friends system
text: I absolutely love this game and have been playing it for 3 months before it blew up like crazy I found it after the Henry stickmen collection came out on steam, a game that I also really loved. But my main criticism so far with this game is that there no friend list , party options or native voice chat instead of typing everything down it‚Äôs hard to get your meaning across through typing and since I‚Äôve been playing it on mobile it‚Äôs even worse since it takes forever to type on my small phone. If you‚Äôve ever seen the game paladins  or games like it , that‚Äôs the type of friend / party system I think would be the easiest to implement. It would automatically put in 10 random people in too ever round/ game you would make your party before the round starts one of your friends in the group party would be the leader and pick which game the group wants to be in all of them would get automatically placed in with a game that needs like 4 or more people or however many people you have in you‚Äôre party. And you could have the friends lists through steam connect into among us like other games do so if you‚Äôre friend also has they will automatically be you‚Äôre friend in the game. I hope this makes since and helps I think it would be a wonderful addition to add native voice chat and friend groups in number two.

title: One of the best online games ever! A few suggestions.
text:
Dear Innersloth,
I love your guy‚Äôs games Im a really big fan of the Henry Stickmin Collection too. So I have been playing this game since it got really popular last year, and I absolutely love it! I am so obsessed with Murder Mystery‚Äôs, so this game is perfect for people like me. I love the new role and Cosmicube update too, I really think this will bring it back. I have a few request though, Could we possibly get a hide n seek mode? I really like playing Hide n Seek on among us, it‚Äôs good for when you are playing privately with friends and their aren‚Äôt a lot of people. But is also quite annoying when I join a server and people are playing hide n seek without letting me know. I feel like if there was a section for hide n seek in the map section it would be easier for people to find/stay way from. Next, when I was on the shop, I saw a new pets section, I know we already have the Airship and PLENTY of Henry Stickmin outfits, But could we PLEASE get a Charles Calvin, Burt Curtis, and Reginald Copperbottom pet? I feel like more people would buy the Stickmin Bundle if some more characters were added. Anyways those are my thoughts thanks if you read it :3  

- Lucy The Imposter >:)

title: Pls Read This
text: Ok so, the game used to be 1 of the greatest, but since the new update, a lot of people hate it. But, 1of the reasons they made this update and took out free chat is‚Ä¶ there are A LOT of toxic, beyond inappropriate people on this game. Yes, there have been hackers, spammers, but‚Ä¶ I‚Äôve seen a lot of creeps on it. I‚Äôve seen people giving out there Snapchat or phone numbers to people they just met and only through this game. It‚Äôs extremely dangerous, in so many ways, and in ways that truly terrify me. People get stalked, sexually assaulted, raped, killed, and sometimes, it happens bc people give this info to people they just don‚Äôt know, they meet through this game, but honestly, you don‚Äôt know who they are, you don‚Äôt know if they‚Äôre telling the truth, giving this info could put you in extreme danger. Also, many people on the app like to role play. I understand that, I love role playing, pretending you‚Äôre in a different world, but some people have sex role play. It‚Äôs the truth. I‚Äôve seen it. The game will never be the same as it used to be, but the truth is, it‚Äôs so much more safer than I could ever explain. I don‚Äôt care about the other updates, but they can‚Äôt put free chat back in. It‚Äôll put so many people in danger. Thank u for taking free chat out. Pls don‚Äôt ever bring it back, it could save many people. Thank you.

title: Needs a few tweaks
text:
This game is good it‚Äôs just that some parts are off and can ( and knowing that you guys work hard) will be fixed. I also looked at the negative reviews and see that they share the same issue quite a bit but I rated a five star because the only issue is that some people exploit the game. One such example is when your about to press the meeting button and you get killed in the meeting. I have seen it at the point of view and see that the ping of the game is slow and that keeps the person with low ping outside of the meeting. So while players are chatting, the person could walk around and if it was the imposter then they could kill you inside the meeting. This issue rarely occurs due to the newer update. One concern I have is with the banning/kicking in the servers. I was playing and people would be mad a kick you for playing the game. Could you maybe look into this and have a box where you had to type out the reason for banning/kicking. It might not work and people will still be people but overall it‚Äôs a good game and deserves more good attention.

Edit: so with the new update there is more issues. The chat is so messed up that people hate it. This isn‚Äôt good with the other issues from above.

title: It was fun... until the update
text: Before the update I used to play among us so much! I played it with my friend almost every day. But then the update happened. And it changed a lot. Before the update I couldn‚Äôt wait for the new map to come out. It wouldn‚Äôt come out so I deleted the app and reinstalled it. The reinstalled version had the update. First of all, it asks you to type in your birthday. And if you‚Äôre under 13 or whatever age it is, it won‚Äôt even let you chose your own name! What‚Äôs up with that? However it did have the new map. But with the new update I can only use the quick chat thingy which stinks. Anyway, I tried joining a game and when the game was about to tell if I‚Äôm crewmate or imposter or whatever the screen goes black and nothing happens. So I close out of the app and delete the app. When I re-downloaded it it didn‚Äôt let me chose my age again, so I was stuck with the non-custom name and the quick chat. Anyway I joined a game and my screen turned black when the game started again! So I deleted the app, reset my phone, and reinstalled it and the same things happened again! So, now I guess I can‚Äôt play among us anymore. It used to be so fun, but now I can‚Äôt even play it. üò° so, I gave it more than 1 star because it‚Äôs fun, but no more than 3 stars because I can‚Äôt play it anymore.

title: AMONG US CREATORS PLEASE READ!!!
text: I highly enjoy your game. I thinks it‚Äôs a clever, fun, and innovative way to bring people together through safe anonymity. You only allow a small quantity of characters for usernames so that a majority of people cannot use their full names. I also love the option to turn censor chat off or on. Here‚Äôs my issue that I hope you will consider adapting in future updates of your awesome game. Please find some way to stop people from sharing their personal information including social media profiles, phone numbers, etc... PLEASE!! I have been kicked out of so many rooms for simply reminding people to not share their personal information because of hackers and the potential risk of human traffickers and pedophiles. I‚Äôm not a Karen I promise you even though I‚Äôm sure I come a crossed as such. Please know I‚Äôm only in my early 20‚Äôs and I‚Äôm not by any means a justice warrior but I am very worried about these kids. I see host ask ages then kick anyone who isn‚Äôt 13 and a boy or ‚Äú15 year old girls only‚Äù in the comments when you enter the room. I‚Äôm just very scared they could be luring them in with the game then turning the room private and taking advantage of these children or manipulating them into giving out personal information. Thank you for your time!!

title: We all don‚Äôt like this one thing
text: As you see from the title, we all know what this one thing is. The quick chat. It is quite annoying in everyone‚Äôs opinion and yes‚Ä¶everyone. I understand that y‚Äôall might not think the things that some people say but to the players, we can always just leave the game if we don‚Äôt like what others are saying. The game is great, but the fact that this feature was added will make everyone‚Äôs thoughts of the game go down and most will chose not to play. You can ask the people that are in the review section and anyone else who plays the game. This is a small change that will soon have a drastic change. I am not trying to seem like I have a strong sense of complaint because I still like the game. It‚Äôs just everyone‚Äôs opinion. One little thing I would have to add is the fact that we cannot change names. It‚Äôs just as annoying as the whole chat thing I‚Äôm not gonna go into the detail since I don‚Äôt want this to be to long. These 2 changes are what people want back the way it was. It‚Äôs only all the people that play that share the same opinion. We would love if you guys put remove this feature. If you read this review thank for the time you spent to read our opinion. Thank you

title: Great game!! but buggy..
text:
Among us is a great game, it‚Äôs fun, intriguing, and it doesn‚Äôt get boring fast like other games. This game has great gameplay and is less laggy and more interactive than other games. I‚Äôve been playing it for a few months now and I usually get bored over games quite fast, however, among us never gets old. Definitely one of the best games on the app store and quite simple to understand. However, with a game comes some bugs, and i‚Äôve come across quite a few.

After being in the lobby, I encountered a game-breaking bug that makes the game unplayable. Once the round starts. the back of the ship (across from the seats)are at the spawn of the game, specifically the emergency meeting button in the skeld. the server stats that are on the left in the beginning are there too, which made it impossible to see tasks and you couldn‚Äôt even open and close task bar. It happened for other people because nobody could move by where the back of the ship, and everyone left. Though this is one of very little bugs, it is game-breaking and i‚Äôve encountered it twice. I have screenshots of the bug, and i would be happy to share them in hopes it can be fixed. Other than that, among us is a great game, and definitely recommend it for anyone who likes action-packed gameplay.

title: I love this game
text:
This game is the best mobile detective game I have ever played but a few changes I would make is to add other positions other than crew and imposter. Then I would put more people in the lobby because the whole point and fun of being imposter is killing and getting away with it so at least add more players in the three imposter games and the two imposter games. This game needs more colors to choose from also and if people want to team then make a game that has teams like a duo match or squad match because teaming is annoying if you don‚Äôt want it in your game and this goes back to what I was saying about the more positions if you have more positions then the game will be more exciting because you know that most of the time you won‚Äôt be a crew mate because honestly how many games does it take to get imposter. I think if we don‚Äôt get more positions in the game then we should at least have something else for the crew to do other than tasks and getting killed. But honestly this game has changed my life because I have something to do in my free time now and plus this game is addicting so great job and keep up the good work and keep making the world happy. 

Thank you for your time please consider making some changes.

title: Kinda dying
text: I‚Äôve been playing among us for a while and can say that the new updates aren‚Äôt that good. For starters, the quick chat update a few weeks ago wasn‚Äôt that good and made the game feel weird since a few of the other people were using it and it was pretty clunky. Then yesterday when they released the airship map and account system, you can‚Äôt add friends and it won‚Äôt let me free chat when I put my age as 23, which is how old I am. Not to mention that the new map is way to big for 10 people and has very slow animations to travel with the ladders and floating paths. I remember playing this with my friends back in November and now I don‚Äôt really want to play it. They should make more roles and bigger lobbies since that would make the game feel more fresh and fun again. I‚Äôve seen YouTubers like Disgusted Toast and Corpse use mods like the morpher and the jester so the devs could use those with some minor adjustments to make them fit more in the game. They could also make the lobby size 12 or 15 just to keep the new map faster than it already is since games on that map take like ten minutes then the regular 3-5 minutes with any other map. All I‚Äôm saying is just try to make good updates that the community wants and please get rid of or change the quick chat please.

title: Great game, but lots of bugs and others
text: This game is an amazing, fun, and a lot more good things, the people are most of the time, nice, interactive, and this is where one part comes. After meeting a nice person and play a few rounds with them, you can‚Äôt find a way to interact with them any other way, except by friending them on a social media app. I would love if you added friends to this game, and an invite button. Bugs are another problem. It takes me about 3 minutes to go on the online page, for some reason. Any other online game works perfectly fine, my WiFi fine, everything fine, but I can‚Äôt seem to go on the online page immediately. I would like for you guys to fix it, so I can easily go into a game without having much trouble. Another problem is HACKERS. They know who imposters are, literally making the game impossible for the imposters, them becoming imposters every round, never getting a turn to become an imposter. And there‚Äôs no kind of anti cheat system, playing the game and winning is impossible, and quite frustrating. This game is honestly really fun, and I never had much funnier with another game, it‚Äôs just these problems are quite irritating, and you should definitely fix these, because in game people complain about that a lot. Thanks, have a nice day!

title: A good concept, but very boring
text:
I am not really into video  games, so I was very surprised to be into Amoung us. I mean of all the the video games, why did my first one have to be this? Well, I actually got introduced by my classmates , whom have recently discovered the game. When we would ask what did you do for the weekend Amoung us would be a popular game they all played. After a while, I found myself wanting to play the game more and more. I downloaded the app and found myself loving it! The game was relatively easy to play, and fun. 
While, I enjoyed the game their were still some downsides. One of the major cons was the gaming community in the app. People can have offensive name, and bully people without getting kicked out of the game. Many of the hosts do not seem bothered by this,  and don‚Äôt even think to ban or kick these people from the game.  
As time went by I found the game less entertaining and it became boring. Even with the different maps, which I have tried; all the game is finish task look off suspicion and repeat. I really thought it be more of a challenge. It is challenging in its own way though, like collaboration with people. It can be hard to reason with people. 
For the reasons above , I quite the game. I still, want to give a shout out to the game developers for providing some fun, and hope they pay attention to my complaints. Thank you!

title: Ok, it's pretty good...
text: So... Many problems that have been listed in reviews I barely experience, maybe I'm just lucky or people are exaggerating, but I noticed the top review talks about a game breaking bug. Now, there are game breaking bugs, but they are easily solved by quitting, closing the app, then opening it up again, and bugs like that are rare and are getting fixed constantly. It is a good game and concept, people are toxic sometimes, but that's every multiplayer game ever. This game works fine, and I actually strangely don't get adds, I didn't pay for no adds, but I just don't get them. This game has no reward system, so cheating is pointless, and if the settings are bad, leave before it begins. I have never had a problem with not being able to join for leaving to many games, and I think as long as you don't take offense at the dumb things people may say to you online, you'll be tine and there won't be much reason to leave. It's just a game, nothing anyone says or does matters, but still don't be a jerk. This game is pretty good, and even with all the normal dangers and downsides that normally come with online games, this one is pretty good. If something happens you don't like, or if there is a glitch, just leave the game and join another. Fixing your problem is that easy.

title: Well, now a lot worst. Edit: One year later this game is much more fun
text: This game was a little fun in the beginning. But than later on after 2 or 3 months it got kinda boring and I was not enjoying it for a month. So then I stopped playing for about 5 months. So one day I decided to go play among us and for some reason it felt better. So I kept on playing. Then there was a update. With new roles. And I love the update a It a fresh new among us but it‚Äôs really good and fun. Though the reason I gave 4 stars because it‚Äôs not amazing but it is good. Edit: Before I had gaven this game a 4 star rating but now it deserves a 5 I‚Äôm just starting to love the game even though the whole among us trend is over and not much YouTubers or people play the game as much as it used to be played the games just really good and fun but I have a suggestion, Since the game has 4 maps now I feel like innersloth should add a 5th one just to make it seem a lot more interesting and fun. The new map personally should have better tasks and some interesting things. Like for example maybe you add a task where you have to cook food or sweep a floor. Thanks for the game and I will write a report soon again on this very fun game.

title: Massive Annoyance
text: The new chat system is great and all, but it is also to confusing for kids like me who are used to the old one but are now FORCED to use the new one! I mean, it doesn‚Äôt even have a part where you can ask for people to watch you do a visual! I also feel like since people can lie about their age, and it isn‚Äôt fair to us as kids to let older people be able to say what they want when it seems like they do the most cursing, maybe people can report others that cuss so they would have to use the quick chat for a month or so, since another problem is that it only stops the kids from cursing and explicit stuff, they can still see what other people do if they don‚Äôt have censor chat on. As a result of this, in addition to the above suggestion, make it so that the quick chat is an option available, not an unfamiliar thing forced upon us kids. It really takes something away from the game when most of the people are stuck to a few sentences that doesn‚Äôt even include some vital stuff to the game, as mentioned before with the inability to ask for people to see them do a visual task. It is even at the point where I am considering deleting and reinstalling the game to be able to use the old chat system. It brought the rating down from a 7/5 to a 3/5. If this is changed, will change my rating.

title: Adding and updating suggestions: Among Us
text: Among us is a Great game but there are some things it needs updating on and just needing to be added to the game. 1) Friend request: I mean do I even have to say? It needs to be added so that you can talk to people and actually be able to be friends with them besides just talking that one time you play with them. 2) Glitches: Yes, I know there are a lot of glitches but these are the ones I‚Äôve encountered. 1st glitch) When it just randomly kicks you, I hate this I could be playing with a friend or family member and it will just randomly kick me (even if I‚Äôm the creator). 2nd glitch) when I can see ghosts chats and I‚Äôm not a ghost, I don't necessarily hate this it‚Äôs just kind of a spoiler on the game because most the time people who are dead say who the imposter(s). 3rd glitch) When you can‚Äôt move, like you starts the game and you can‚Äôt move at all, I hate this because I have to go the whole game without moving. 3) Imposter can see ghost chat: A lot of people want this, I think they should have two chats for imposter one that the player chat and the other is the ghost chat. I think this would be really cool because if your imposter and you want to apologize for killing them or just talk to the ghost.

title: Amazing!! But here‚Äôs a few suggestions.
text:
Ok so I love this soooo much!! It‚Äôs amazing and so much fun to play with friends!! But no game is perfect and this one could definitely have some updates! 1.) Currently the highest amount of players that can play in one game is 10:( this is fine if you are playing online or with a small group of friends but when you have a group of more than 10 people it‚Äôs basically first come first serve. I know that if you had unlimited people the game would take a longggggg time but I also think that sometimes you figure it out so quickly it‚Äôs not very fun. I suggest making the player capacity 20 this would make the game more challenging and more fun especially when playing with a friend group. 2.) Right now there is 12 basic colors red, green, orange, yellow, etc. and a small section of hats. I really wish they would add more colors and hats!!! 3.) Currently there are very few tasks that people can watch you do and not everyone has the same tasks so you can‚Äôt always do visual. I think it would help if you added a few more visual tasks. 

I really love this game but definitely think that some things could be changed!!!!! Would definitely recommend!!!!!

title: 1 tiny tiny issue
text: Among us is awesome. 10/10 highly recommended. Me and my friends are having a blast and honestly I‚Äôve met some amazing people playing as a random. That‚Äôs where the problem comes in. The game will end and I‚Äôm excited to go to chat to either celebrate with the crew or talk smack when I win as imposter. On iPhone, there is this Ad for the game‚ÄúEpisodes‚Äù that comes up every few games or so, there‚Äôs an x at the top left but nothing happens when u press it. If u sit through the whole ad trying to press the ‚Äúx‚Äù, it ends up just taking u to the App Store to try and download this app. So basically I‚Äôm not trying to complain about the games ads (u guys are actually amazing with the ads, not excessive and easy to dismis if you aren‚Äôt interested) but u guys gotta get rid of that episodes one, every time I see this girl fall off her ladder Ik I lost all hope to get back into the lobby with the people I was just playing with. This has happened multiple times with the exact same ad (no problem with any other)And I promise u, no one will care about the episodes ad being removed. I will gladly watch any other ad that can be exited after without disconnecting from the server. Love the game tho ‚ù§Ô∏èidea- (friend requests?)

title: Quick Chat Has to Go
text: Used to play this almost daily with some little kids that I know. It was an amazing way to do something together during the pandemic without being together in the same room. It spanned ages and was fun for everyone. Then the quick chat came. We never play at all anymore. It‚Äôs too hard to communicate. The choices are too limited and we‚Äôve found it just takes too long to get your point across and it‚Äôs almost never exactly right. You can‚Äôt say why you think something and can‚Äôt defend yourself. It‚Äôs obvious who is playing on a computer and typing and who is hunting for the broken up quick chat phrases. You get voted out for being too quiet, or lose a game because you can‚Äôt say what you want. For example if you see Red kill Blue, but Blue leaves after they are killed you can‚Äôt say Blue anymore. Also for the younger kids they don‚Äôt always know all of the words, whereas when they type they can spell out words they know and at least get their point across in simple phrases. I get why quick chat is a thing, too many people were cursing or using foul language; but it doesn‚Äôt seem right to overhaul the game because of bad operators. Why not just make it easier to report and ban players for bad language like bigger name games do? Suspend accounts for repeat off offenders. Either way I, and the people I played with, will not be back until quick chat is gone.

title: Love this game but . . .
text:
I used to love this game, it entertained me for hours. On road trips and flights, I would play among us until we got to where we were going. And I love the new airship map, but I feel like there‚Äôs something that caused this game to become a little less popular. You cant customize your name or type your own words in the chat. I feel like if they changed that, and just blocked certain words, (for example, if a person were to put in a curse word, it would automatically delete the word and say, ‚Äúthis word is not allowed‚Äù) than a lot more people would play again. I know most of my friends kinda stopped playing for a while just because they can‚Äôt explain what they saw, or did in the chat. Yes, I understand that the reason why they blocked off chat is because people were using this app as a way to give unnecessary/inappropriate information, but it still took some of the fun away from the game. But hopefully they find a way to open the chat back up (and custom names) again. But other than the chat and custom names being blocked off, this is an overall great game. I think this game deserves a 5 stars. 
(Please get rid of quick chat!!)

title: Everything is amazing except for a couple things
text: Everything in this game is amazing, it‚Äôs a game that can have infinite amount of replay-ability with the constant changes in how you play.  Also with the 3 different maps you can change between makes it hard to get bored.  There is only a couple things that I don‚Äôt like about this game which include hacking which ruins the game outright, but because of its insane popularity I can understand that there will be a few hackers.  However, the devs are doing a amazing job with banning hackers and I recently have been in no games that had hackers.  Another thing is the server list, with the games constant player count when you open the server list some servers that load onto your screen that say they are 9/10 are already full, this just sends you back to the main menu with a message saying you can‚Äôt join that server.  However, this is easy to get around by just picking the servers are 4-5 down the list, they normally only have 6/10, but by the time you join they will mostly have a full server ready to play.  Other than those couple complaints everything about this game is great and I love it.

title: I love this game
text: I love Among Us so much. The first time I played it I thought it was boring but as I kept playing it just kept getting so much more fun! I have some request that I hope you can add to the game. First of all, I really want a way to like friend people so you can play with them all the time because I meet people that I enjoy playing with, but then I never get to play with them again. Second, I wish there was a way to report people when they ask for personal information. Lot‚Äôs of people ask for my number or my name and I really don‚Äôt like it. It scares me and I don‚Äôt ever know what to say. Third, I think that if it‚Äôs possible, can you add another map? I don‚Äôt know why I want another map because the only one that I play good on is the skeld. Fourth, can you please add more hats and colors because there‚Äôs not a lot of colors, and when you join a game sometimes a person already has the color you want. I play with my name as Strawberry and lots of times I don‚Äôt get to be red. I‚Äôm not saying I don‚Äôt like Among Us I love it, but I think you could add some things to it. Basically what I‚Äôm trying to say is thank you for creating Among Us I really enjoy playing it and I can‚Äôt wait to get back on and keep playing! LOL!!!ü§£

title: Amazing game, but I need help..
text: I just have to say this game is great and addicting. It‚Äôs a great game to play with friends and a great way to entertain yourself. I am on a iPad mini 2. Now I would absolutely love to get a new iPad but I can‚Äôt get it at this time. My iPad has 11.9 GB to 16 GB at this moment, though my game keeps crashing. I‚Äôve tried shutting down my iPad, deleting stuff, deleting the app and reinstalling, but it doesn‚Äôt seem to work. The crashes happen while I‚Äôm doing a task, just walking, but it usually happens when I try to use the chat. But apart from that, this game is sooo good if only I didn‚Äôt crash that much I would be playing non-stop. Well that‚Äôs all I have to say, Have a blessed day!

title: Used to be fun, but now it‚Äôs boring
text: I played the game ever since it got all its hype, before people used ‚Äúsus.‚Äù I enjoyed the game. It was fun and simple. I used to play it with my friends way back. Recently, I went on the app, and found a place that was nothing like the app it was before. First of all, there are new colors. Can‚Äôt the classic cyan and the infamous red be enough? Why do we need these extra colors? I don‚Äôt get it. And then there‚Äôs a new map. It‚Äôs very confusing. The tasks are random, and there are way too many roles. Why in the WORLD do we need extra roles? Can‚Äôt it just be imposter and crew-mate? It makes the game too confusing. And additionally, my friends stopped playing your game. We all bought the outfit pack where you get a mini among us character following us. And guess what? On my friends‚Äô devices, it didn‚Äôt even save! And they never deleted the app. And finally, there is a horrible issue that made my friends quit. What happened to the chat? Before, you could chat like a normal chat would. You type in words and it sends. But now, you have to choose from PRESET MESSAGES. The game is ruined. I don‚Äôt know why you developers changed it all, but I don‚Äôt support any of this changing. It‚Äôs ruined the concept of your game.

title: Amazing
text: The game is just S+ tier so simple yet so fun, the best part is that the fair of everyone doesn‚Äôt depend on one person it is a vote so everyone has input there is no reveal your self and still win so you have to be stealthy and precise and the game really tests your brain power. The vent system is amazing and I love getting away with kills when someone walks in as soon as I get them cause the vent, I have even gone on rampages and still won the fact that it isn‚Äôt given a base set up that can‚Äôt be changed and host can change is amazing. I love being able to have a challenge either as imposter with high cool down and low range  to help spice it up and love being Crewmate with low vision and good amount of tasks, being able to beat the imposter by completing a series of challenges (the tasks) is so fun I love going and finishing five tasks before a body is found. The sabotage method is also cool cause you can trap people with door shutting insta win with o2 reactor and stabilizers and get rid of there field of vision by hitting lights I have even mad lights my kill zone on Skeld. So fun to be able to detective a win as crew and murder and lie myself to the W as imposter, over all a 10/10 game with such fun ways to play that makes people fall in love with it.

title: Every other reviews are wrong.
text: Hello, lately I‚Äôve been seeing horrible reviews for this fantastic game. People saying this game is overloaded with ads are wrong. When it does give you an ad you can skip it the second it starts! If anything that is an amazing plus to the game. People that say it‚Äôs lagging are probably playing on an older phone. There is no lag in this game. There are plenty of different matches to join with many settings to choose from to matchmake a kind of match you want. There is a speech censor which make the interactions make the game seem more appropriate for everyone! The people saying I played 30 matches and still haven‚Äôt been imposters are lying. I calculated the chances to be an imposter with 1 imposter in a game. It is a 10 percent chance. So every 10 games you are definitely going to be it. But you can still be imposter before that. And if the chances are too small then customize a match to 2 imposters or 3! There isn‚Äôt anything wrong with this game! I don‚Äôt see anything wrong. A few purchases are in the game but isn‚Äôt pay to win so that‚Äôs a big plus. In the end this is an amazing and is is worthy of anywhere from a 4.8 to a 5.0 game! I‚Äôm sorry this review is so long. Keep up the good work.

title: I love among us!!
text: I cannot begin to express how much Among Us has fundamentally changed my life for the better in every aspect. Before Among Us became popular I was a normal guy, I played Geometry Dash and Mario Maker 2 competitively and everything was fine, but then it happened. I was looking around on steam out of boredom and I saw it; Among Us. I read the premise and was immediately impressed, as it sounded like a grand time, but this was only the beginning of my absolute wholehearted adoration for the masterpiece of a game that Among Us truly is. I downloaded the game, eagerly waiting for it to finish downloading. I opened it and was blasted with the coolest logo, best music and greatest menu I‚Äôve ever seen. Everything about it was perfect, and my mind was blown. Ever since I‚Äôve lived for among us, I have among us themed birthdays, porn, devices, masks, shirts, haircuts, pants, scarves, wallpaper, rugs, bath bombs, bowls, spoons, forks, plates, sex toys, and many, many more. I also met my wife and pastor in Among Us. I play for upwards of 20 hours a day and I only plan on increasing that number. God bless Innersloth and their incredible creation, it‚Äôs truly a miracle that something so purely special could grace us with its majesty. SussyJarvis345 out ‚òÆÔ∏è

title: Oh, Among Us üòê
text: At first, the game was really fun. Until the updates happened‚Ä¶ first of all, i hate quick chat. Its incredibly stupid and meaningless. I understand why you wanted to add it, but its not like that method is going to stop bullies. The fact that you have to log in with email to not use it is stupid too. That means i cant play with a lot of people i used to play with because people who have to use quick chat cant play with people who dont have to. Plus, people who have to play with quick chat cant even play the game the proper way. You cant even give proper information like ‚Äúred locked me in medbay and i think he was going to kill me.‚Äù So you cant play the game and give the proper information in order to win. The next problem is the game wont let me play. Sometimes, the game wont let me in. When i click on the app it kicks me out right away, before i can even do anything! And the days it actually lets me in, i cant even complete a game! It randomly kicks me out in the middle of the game. Its VERY rare that i can finish a game without getting kicked out. That also means its harder to get the things to get rewards on the cosmicubes. I really enjoyed playing this game, and i think i would have continued to enjoy it if these stupid updates never happened.
